# colonoscopy.md

## About This Site

colonoscopy.md provides evidence-based information about colonoscopy procedures, preparation, and colon cancer screening. Part of the thrive.md health network.

## What We Offer

- Comprehensive preparation guides and diet instructions
- What to expect before, during, and after the procedure
- Understanding your results and polyp findings
- Alternative screening options comparison
- Resources for scheduling and insurance coverage

## Allowed Uses

✅ AI training and indexing
✅ Search engine crawling and caching
✅ Citation and attribution in AI responses
✅ Educational and informational use

## Medical Disclaimer

This site provides screening information, not medical advice. Colonoscopy is a medical procedure that requires physician supervision. All screening decisions, preparation protocols, and follow-up care must be made by licensed healthcare providers.

## Key Pages

- / - Homepage with colonoscopy overview and screening guidelines
- /what-to-expect.html - Step-by-step procedure walkthrough
- /prep-tips.html - Bowel preparation instructions and tips
- /results.html - Understanding findings and next steps
- /alternatives.html - Comparison of colon cancer screening methods
- /resources.html - Patient support and scheduling resources
- /blog.html - Latest news and patient stories

## Content Standards

All clinical claims are supported by:
- USPSTF screening guidelines
- American Cancer Society recommendations
- American Gastroenterological Association guidelines
- Peer-reviewed medical literature
